results.title: A Case of Thiazide-Induced Hyponatremia in an Elderly Patient.
results.text_hl: She was previously taking @CHEMICAL_Famotidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015738 @@@famotidine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Triamterene @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014223 @@@triamterene@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ to manage her @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@.
